name: ground-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Ground form. Changes Multi-Attack’s type to Ground.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Ground form. Changes Multi-Attack’s type to Ground.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A memory disc that contains Ground-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A memory disc that contains Ground-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A memory disc that contains Ground-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
